QuestData.Title: Walking Dog
QuestData.Description: Dog ain't my "pet." He's a member of this crew, and my best friend. Saved my life more than once, you know.$B$BBut I'm gettin' too old to walk him anymore, and he still needs his exercise. Take Dog for a trip around the shelf for me, would ya?$B$BHe loves to swim through the hot geysers just southeast of the shallows.$B$BHe absolutely has to... er... "leave his mark" on the dead whale at the far western edge of the shelf.$B$BOh, and he'll want to visit our old shipwreck, too. He likes to reminisce.
QuestData.LogDescription: Take Dog to visit the hot geysers, the whale corpse, and the wreck of the Mist-Hopper on the Shelf of Mazu.
QuestData.CompletionText: Dog deserves all the freedom the sea has to offer him - I've tried to set him free, but he won't go.$B$BBest we can do anymore is take him out for walks now and then.
QuestData.RewardText: How did it go? I hope he didn't cause too much trouble!

Objectives.Objective: Bring Dog to the Silt Vents
Bring Dog to the Wreck of the Mist-Hopper
Bring Dog to the Whale Corpse
